name: Mayonnaise Simulator
description:
You play as a jar of mayonnaise who has to launch mayo at some ketchup bottles before they get to you. You will have to jump around to avoid them as they approach because if they touch you too many times, you lose. Stay on the shelf and stay alive.

Game includes third person shooting
Minor 'platforming'
Jumping jar of mayonnaise
Aggressive ketchup
More condiments to come
More additions to the game will be happening as I learn how to do things
